segments.text: The hotel operator . Anything I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've been trying to get through to the booking office for the last ten minutes . But the line has been engaged all the time . Why is it taking so long ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry to hear that . I'm afraid it is often the case during the peak hours . Shall I ask them to call you when the line is free ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Please do so if it is not troublesome .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No trouble at all . May I know your name and room number ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Wait in the room , please .
segments.speaker: S1
